text: The 2026 California State Treasurer election will be held on November 3, 2026, to elect the State Treasurer of California. == Candidates == === Democratic Party === ==== Declared ==== *Libby Schaaf, former Mayor of Oakland (2015–2023) *Tony Vazquez, member of the California State Board of Equalization (2019–present) ==== Potential ==== *Malia Cohen, California State Controller (2023–present) *Eleni Kounalakis, Lieutenant Governor of California (2019–present) (currently running for governor) ==Endorsements== == References == ==Other websites== ;Official campaign websites *Libby Schaaf (D) for State Treasurer Category:2026 elections in the United States Category:2026 in California
title: 2026 California State Treasurer election
